医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
吃这个，不是：最好（且最糟糕的）食物寿命对分析超过100万参与者的41项研究的全面综述发现，食用坚果，全谷物，水果，蔬菜和鱼类与降低全因死亡率有关，而加工和未经处理的红肉和糖含糖饮料的饮料会增加死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/eat-this-this-not-that-the-best---------------------------foreds-foreds-for longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/eat-this-not-that-the-best----------- and-worst-）foods-fords-for longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45BC985E-C5BE-4E28-A6CE-24B92C252862 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 16:27:00 -0500 Eat this, not that: The best (and worst) foods for longevity
释放双重记忆B细胞在癌症治疗中的潜力匹兹堡大学医学院和UPMC Hillman癌症中心科学家发现了一个新型的抗癌免疫细胞子集，该细胞位于其正常社区以外（被称为第三级淋巴样结构），在与肿瘤密切接触时，它们变得令人沮丧的功能障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/unlocking-the-potential-of-double-double-memory-memory-b-cells-in-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/unlocking-the-potential-of-double-double-memory-memory-b-cells-in-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BB058F56-B1A2-4565-9678-FADF50E564C8 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 14:40:46 -0500 Unlocking the potential of double negative memory B cells in cancer treatment
探索氯胺酮在抵抗治疗抑郁症的斗争中的潜力重度抑郁症（MDD）是全球残疾的主要原因，其中相当一部分患者（10-20％）发展为耐药抑郁症（TRD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/exploring-ketamines-potential-in-the-the-the-the-fight-against-wareatment-reatment-reatment-resistant-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/exploring-ketamines-potential-in-the-the-the-fight-against-wareatment-treatment-restment-resistant-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d172ab4e-f833-40af-92de-6B9881EB3630 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 14:33:48 -0500 Exploring ketamine's potential in the fight against treatment-resistant depression
小鼠研究提供了有关大脑如何平衡风险和回报的洞察力每天，我们的大脑都会做出数千个大小的决定。这些决定中的任何一个 - 从最不合时宜的情况下，例如选择餐厅到更重要的事情，例如从事不同的职业或搬到新城市 - 可能会带来更好或更糟的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/mice-study-ctudy-ctudy-ingign-insight-into-how-the-the-brain-brain-barance-risk-alk-and-reward.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/mice-study-ctudy-ctudy-chight-insight-insto-how-the-the-brain-brain-barance-risk-alk-and-reward.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13131D12-3127-44F9-9191-8CD1E5E7C3BB Wed, 19 Feb 2025 14:27:05 -0500 Mice study offers insight into how the brain balances risk and reward
创新方法改善了对肾脏疾病中细胞和分子机制的理解研究人员证明了基于形态学的方法来解释空间转录组（ST）数据，有助于在细胞和分子水平上提高对慢性肾脏疾病（CKD）病变的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/innovative-method-improves-underding-of-cellular-and-and-molecular-molecular-mechanismiss-in-kidney-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/innovative-method-improves-mproves-undercanding-of-cellular-and-molecular-molecular-mechanisms-in-kidney-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35DD3B76-3282-4B6B-8727-935A125662C0 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 14:20:54 -0500 Innovative method improves understanding of cellular and molecular mechanisms in kidney diseases
新的治疗性鸡尾酒显示出对持久哮喘缓解的希望当前的哮喘治疗对所有患者均无作用，也不能长期缓解潜在的致命哮喘攻击。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/new-therapeutic-cocktails-show-promise-promise-formise-long-long-long-lasting-asthma-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/new-therapeutic-cocktails-show-promise-promise-formise-long-long-long-lasting-asthma-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee849A2B-7505-4810-BA18-8EA3BBE8C692 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 14:11:46 -0500 New therapeutic cocktails show promise for long-lasting asthma relief
